TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyPressEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个指定当用户按下某个键构成的字符。A specifies the character that is composed when the user presses a key. 例如，当用户按下 SHIFT + K、属性返回大写的 k。For example, when the user presses SHIFT + K, the property returns an uppercase K. 一个用户按下某个键时发生事件。A event occurs when the user presses a key. 与密切相关的两个事件事件都和。Two events that are closely related to the event are and . 事件先于每个事件，当用户按下某个键，和一个用户释放某个键时发生事件。The event precedes each event when the user presses a key, and a event occurs when the user releases a key. 当用户按住某个键时，重复和字符重复每次发生的事件。When the user holds down a key, duplicate and events occur each time the character repeats. 一个发布后生成事件。One event is generated upon release. 与每个事件，传递。With each event, a is passed. 一个与每个传递和事件。A is passed with each and event. 一个指定另一个密钥以及是否按下任何修改键 （CTRL、 shift 键或 ALT）。A specifies whether any modifier keys (CTRL, SHIFT, or ALT) were pressed along with another key. (还可以通过获取此修饰符信息属性的类。)(This modifier information can also be obtained through the property of the class.) 设置到`true`取消`KeyPress`事件。Set to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event. 这可以防止该控件处理按键。This keeps the control from processing the key press. > [!NOTE] > 某些控件将在处理某些击键。Some controls will process certain key strokes on . 例如，处理 Enter 键之前调用。For example, processes the Enter key before is called. 在这种情况下，不能取消事件，必须取消从击键和相反。In such cases, you cannot cancel the event, and must cancel the key stroke from instead. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用计入密钥，因为它们被按下并在每次按键后显示结果。The following example illustrates using the to count keys as they are pressed and to display the results after each key press. 然后设置为 true，以防止操作系统中进一步处理密钥。 is then set to true to keep the operating system from further processing the key. 该示例假定窗体具有在其上放置。The example assumes a form with a placed on it. [!code-cpp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 必须创建此类的新实例。You must create a new instance of this class. 您还必须设置事件处理程序。You must also set the event handler. 您可以执行此操作在构造函数中你的类。You can do this in the constructor for your class. [!code-cpp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 当控件中引发指定的事件时，会调用附加的方法和应用程序可执行代码以响应事件。When the specified event is raised in the control, the attached method is called and the application can execute code in response to the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性获取的修改键的当前状态。Use the property to get the current state of the modifier keys. ## Examples 以下示例显示一个消息框，显示了 SHIFT 键的当前状态。The following example displays a message box that shows the current state of the SHIFT key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不处理该事件，它将发送到操作系统的默认处理。If the event is not handled, it will be sent to the operating system for default processing. 设置到`true`取消`KeyPress`事件。Set to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event. ## Examples 下面的示例创建控件。The following example creates a control. `keypressed`方法使用属性检查是否按下 ENTER 键。The `keypressed` method uses the property to check whether the ENTER key is pressed. 如果按下 ENTER 键，则属性设置为`true`，指示该事件进行处理。If the ENTER key is pressed, the property is set to `true`, which indicates the event is handled. [!code-cpp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/VB/form1.vb#1)]

The ASCII character that is composed.

value.span: 例如，如果用户按下 Shift + K，则该属性返回一个大写的 K。

span.span: For example, if the user presses SHIFT + K, this property returns an uppercase K.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性设置为在运行时和修改在特殊运行时环境下的键击示例击键。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to modify keystrokes under special run-time circumstances. 例如，可以使用用户输入邮政编码时禁用非数字按键、 更改按键所有字母都改为在数据输入字段中，大写或监视键盘或其他关键的输入的设备的特定键组合。For example, you can use to disable non-numeric keypresses when the user enters a ZIP code, change all alphabetical keypresses to uppercase in a data entry field, or monitor the keyboard or other key input device for specific key combinations. 可以获取或设置以下项：You can get or set the following keys: - a-z, A-Z.a-z, A-Z. - CTRL。CTRL. - 标点符号。Punctuation marks. - 数字键，同时在顶部的键盘和数字键盘上。Number keys, both across the top of the keyboard and on the numeric keypad. - 输入。ENTER. 无法获取或设置以下项：You cannot get or set the following keys: - TAB 键。The TAB key. - 插入和删除。INSERT and DELETE. - 主页。HOME. - 结束日期。END. - PAGE UP 和 PAGE down 键。PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN. - F1-F2.F1-F2. - ALT。ALT. - 箭头键。Arrow keys. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何检测到任何上面提到的非字符键的信息，请参阅类。For information about how to detect any of the non-character keys mentioned above, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例创建控件。The following example creates a control. `keypressed`方法使用属性检查是否按下 ENTER 键。The `keypressed` method uses the property to check whether the ENTER key pressed. 如果按下 ENTER 键，则属性设置为`true`，指示该事件进行处理。If the ENTER key is pressed, the property is set to `true`, which indicates the event is handled. [!code-cpp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/VB/form1.vb#1)]
